20110110150505.000|20110110150507.000|CC1|HE WAS UNPREDICTABLE.

20110110150510.000|20110110150513.000|CC1|THINGS THAT WERE, TO MY MIND,   
20110110150513.000|20110110150513.000|CC1|PARANOID.                       
20110110150513.000|20110110150514.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THIS MORNING,      
20110110150514.000|20110110150515.000|CC1|OFFICIALS SAY THEY STILL DON'T  
20110110150515.000|20110110150516.000|CC1|KNOW THE MOTIVE FOR THE         
20110110150516.000|20110110150518.000|CC1|SHOOTING, BUT THEY DO SAY A     
20110110150518.000|20110110150519.000|CC1|PERSON OF INTEREST, A MAN       
20110110150519.000|20110110150520.000|CC1|THOUGHT TO HAVE ARRIVED AT THE  
20110110150520.000|20110110150522.000|CC1|SCENE WITH LOUGHNER, HAS BEEN   
20110110150522.000|20110110150523.000|CC1|CLEARED.                        
20110110150523.000|20110110150524.000|CC1|INVESTIGATORS SAY THAT MAN HAD  
20110110150524.000|20110110150526.000|CC1|NOTHING AT ALL TO DO WITH THE   
20110110150526.000|20110110150527.000|CC1|SHOOTINGS.                      
20110110150527.000|20110110150529.000|CC1|LOUGHNER, THEY BELIEVE, ACTED   
20110110150529.000|20110110150529.000|CC1|ALONE.

20110110150531.000|20110110150533.000|CC1|THIS TIME TO SUGGEST ANY        
20110110150533.000|20110110150535.000|CC1|SPECIFIC THREAT REMAINS.        
20110110150535.000|20110110150536.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE DEAD RANGE IN  
20110110150536.000|20110110150539.000|CC1|AGE FROM 9 TO 79, INCLUDING     
20110110150539.000|20110110150540.000|CC1|FEDERAL JUDGE JOHN ROLL, WHO HAD

20110110150550.000|20110110150552.000|CC1|GREEN, BORN ON 9/11, WHO WANTED 
20110110150552.000|20110110150553.000|CC1|TO LEARN MORE ABOUT GOVERNMENT. 
20110110150553.000|20110110150555.000|CC1|>> I THINK EVERYBODY PAUSED WHEN

20110110150601.000|20110110150605.000|CC1|>> SHE BEGAN HER LIFE ON A

20110110150608.000|20110110150613.000|CC1|ARIZONA.                        
20110110150613.000|20110110150613.000|CC1|>> Reporter: CONGRESSWOMAN      
20110110150613.000|20110110150615.000|CC1|GIFFORDS IS MARRIED TO ASTRONAUT
20110110150615.000|20110110150617.000|CC1|MARK KELLY, A SHUTTLE ASTRONAUT 
20110110150617.000|20110110150618.000|CC1|WHO WAS TRAINING FOR AN UPCOMING
20110110150618.000|20110110150619.000|CC1|MISSION.

20110110150631.000|20110110150633.000|CC1|THIS GREAT NATION FOR THEIR

20110110150635.000|20110110150637.000|CC1|GABBY WAS DOING WHAT SHE LOVED  
20110110150637.000|20110110150639.000|CC1|MOST, HEARING FROM HER          
20110110150639.000|20110110150640.000|CC1|CONSTITUENTS, WHEN THIS TRAGEDY 
20110110150640.000|20110110150640.000|CC1|OCCURRED.

20110110150651.000|20110110150652.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN'S SIDE.           
20110110150652.000|20110110150654.000|CC1|>> LESTER HOLT FOR US THIS      
20110110150654.000|20110110150655.000|CC1|MORNING IN TUCSON.              
20110110150655.000|20110110150655.000|CC1|THANK YOU VERY MUCH.            
20110110150655.000|20110110150656.000|CC1|EARLIER THIS MORNING, I SPOKE TO
20110110150656.000|20110110150659.000|CC1|DANIELLE HERNANDEZ, WHO HAD JUST
20110110150659.000|20110110150703.000|CC1|STARTED WORKING AS AN INTERN FOR
20110110150703.000|20110110150703.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVE GIFFORDS.        
20110110150703.000|20110110150706.000|CC1|HIS HEROIC ACTIONS ARE BEING    
20110110150706.000|20110110150708.000|CC1|CREDITED TO SAVING HER LIFE.    
20110110150708.000|20110110150710.000|CC1|I ASKED HIM WHAT HE SAW WHEN THE
20110110150710.000|20110110150711.000|CC1|SHOTTED WERE FIRED.             
20110110150711.000|20110110150715.000|CC1|>> I RACED TO HER AND I NOTICED 
20110110150715.000|20110110150716.000|CC1|THERE WERE A FEW OTHER PEOPLE   
20110110150716.000|20110110150717.000|CC1|WHO WERE INJURED.               
20110110150717.000|20110110150718.000|CC1|I TRIED TO ASSESS WHO WAS STILL 
20110110150718.000|20110110150720.000|CC1|ALIVE BY CHECKING FOR PULSES AND
20110110150720.000|20110110150721.000|CC1|FOR BREATH.                     
20110110150721.000|20110110150722.000|CC1|I GOT TO ABOUT TWO OR THREE     
20110110150722.000|20110110150724.000|CC1|PEOPLE WHEN I NOTICED THAT THE  
20110110150724.000|20110110150725.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN HAD BEEN HIT.     
20110110150725.000|20110110150726.000|CC1|I THEN SAW THAT SHE HAD BEEN HIT
20110110150726.000|20110110150728.000|CC1|IN THE HEAD.                    
20110110150728.000|20110110150730.000|CC1|SO I PRIORITIZED HER, BECAUSE OF
20110110150730.000|20110110150731.000|CC1|THE SEVERITY OF HER WOUNDS AND  
20110110150731.000|20110110150733.000|CC1|STAYED WITH HER FOR THE REST OF 
20110110150733.000|20110110150733.000|CC1|THE TIME.                       
20110110150733.000|20110110150735.000|CC1|>> DANIEL, THE WAY YOU SPEAK,   
20110110150735.000|20110110150736.000|CC1|IT'S CLEAR YOU HAVE SOME MEDICAL
20110110150736.000|20110110150737.000|CC1|TRAINING.                       
20110110150737.000|20110110150740.000|CC1|WHAT'S THE EXTENT OF THAT       
20110110150740.000|20110110150740.000|CC1|TRAINING?                       
20110110150740.000|20110110150740.000|CC1|>> VERY BASIC.                  
20110110150740.000|20110110150743.000|CC1|WHEN I WAS IN HIGH SCHOOL, I DID
20110110150743.000|20110110150745.000|CC1|A COURSE TO TRAIN AS A CERTIFIED
20110110150745.000|20110110150747.000|CC1|NURSING ASSISTANT A AS A        
20110110150747.000|20110110150748.000|CC1|PHLEBOTOMIST.                   
20110110150748.000|20110110150749.000|CC1|I SPENT A LITTLE TIME AT A      
20110110150749.000|20110110150751.000|CC1|HOSPITAL WHERE I DID SOME EXTRA 
20110110150751.000|20110110150753.000|CC1|WORK WITH INTO TRIAGE AND INTO  
20110110150753.000|20110110150754.000|CC1|FIRST AID.                      
20110110150754.000|20110110150755.000|CC1|>> ONE OF THE THINGS YOU DID    
20110110150755.000|20110110150756.000|CC1|IMMEDIATELY AFTER CHECKING      
20110110150756.000|20110110150757.000|CC1|PULSES ON SOME OF THESE OTHER

20110110150802.000|20110110150803.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN -- TO THE         
20110110150803.000|20110110150805.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN, WAS YOU PUT HER

20110110150806.000|20110110150809.000|CC1|LAP, BECAUSE YOU SAW THERE WAS  
20110110150809.000|20110110150810.000|CC1|AN ENORMOUS AMOUNT OF BLOOD, AND
20110110150810.000|20110110150812.000|CC1|YOU DIDN'T WANT HER TO CHOKE ON 
20110110150812.000|20110110150812.000|CC1|HER OWN BLOOD.                  
20110110150812.000|20110110150814.000|CC1|AND YOU APPLIED THIS PRESSURE.  
20110110150814.000|20110110150815.000|CC1|DID YOU UNDERSTAND THE SEVERITY 
20110110150815.000|20110110150818.000|CC1|OF HER WOUND AT THAT TIME?      
20110110150818.000|20110110150821.000|CC1|>> I DID.                       
20110110150821.000|20110110150823.000|CC1|I COULD TELL THAT SHE HAD A     
20110110150823.000|20110110150825.000|CC1|PRETTY SEVERE GUNSHOT, BUT I WAS

20110110151409.000|20110110151409.000|CC1|HIM.                            
20110110151409.000|20110110151414.000|CC1|HAD YOU -- IS THAT CORRECT?     
20110110151414.000|20110110151415.000|CC1|>> YES.

20110110153214.000|20110110153216.000|CC1|AND WE LOVED EVERY MINUTE OF IT.
20110110153216.000|20110110153218.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN THAT SHORT LIFE,
20110110153218.000|20110110153220.000|CC1|CHRISTINA ENJOYED DANCING,      
20110110153220.000|20110110153221.000|CC1|SINGING IN HER CHURCH CHOIR AND 
20110110153221.000|20110110153222.000|CC1|PLAYING LITTLE LEAGUE.
